title: Shehnaz Gill's Rival Himanshi Khurana May Soon Enter Bigg Boss House As First Wild Card Entry
text:
Expect some more fireworks as the first wild card entrant in Bigg Boss 13 is Punjabi singer Himanshi Khurana. She appeared in Punjabi movie Sadda Haq and gained instant fame but her history with current Bigg Boss contestant Shehnaz is what is going to make her entry a little more interesting.

According to reports, Shehnaz and Himanshi have been foes since a long time and their war of words in the real world have often made headlines.

Bigg Boss house is already a circus right now and with Himanshi's entry, things are going to get crazier still.

Don't Miss 244 SHARES 1.3 K SHARES 279 SHARES 8.2 K SHARES 219 SHARES

Often tagged as “cute and dumb” by fellow contestants, Shehnaz has established a firm foot in the game by being one of the most dramatic contestants. While fans are already bored of Rashmi Desai and Siddharth Shukla's repeated fights over 'kitchen' issues, we hope makers' way of spicing up the show actually benefits them!

Twitter

How excited are you to watch Himanshi's entry on the show? Tell us in comments section below.
